outputs.output_descr:
Main Objectives in Equateur:
The creation of a participatory framework to analyze, identify and peacefully resolve inter/intra community conflict, as well as issues involving local authorities and civil society, 
including human rights violations and sexual violence. 2) The identification of economic recovery opportunities in marginalized and vulnerable communities, with particular emphasis on unemployed youth.

Main objectives in Kasaï Orientale:
1) Contribute to increasing access to basic social services. 2) Contribute to building the capacities of the provincial administration and forging partnerships between the local authorities and civil society

1) Organisation of a dialogue process to analyse key structural conflict causes and identify most appropriate responses. 2) Based on findings of the above dialogue and conflict analysis, development of appropriate conflict sensitive programmatic response which will form the basis of UNDP's new provincial recovery programme to be launched from 2008. 3) Support to immediate stabilisation activities

1) Support conflict prevention schemes in Kisangani, Buta and Isiro. 2) Lay the foundations for sustainable long term development by contributing to the re-establishment of basic services and productive capacities of the targeted communities.

Main Objectives in Equateur:
The creation of a participatory framework to analyze, identify and peacefully resolve inter/intra community conflict, as well as issues involving local authorities and civil society, 
including human rights violations and sexual violence. 2) The identification of economic recovery opportunities in marginalized and vulnerable communities, with particular emphasis on unemployed youth.

project_descr: Support to Recovery and Peacebuilding Initiatives
project_title: Support to Recovery and Peacebuilding Initiatives
